messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] frozen mudslides Was Pat....
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/1/03 3:52:46 AM, CelticFrau@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/1/03 3:52:46 AM, CelticFrau@... writes:

<< I bartended for a while, and a good one to try is (I've heard it called
both
of these) and Arizona Bulldog or a Phoenix Bulldog. Make it like this: In a
tall glass put a shot of Vodka, shot of Kahlua. Fill the rest of the glass
with half milk, half coke. Yum, tastes like a coke float. >>

Oooooo, I bartended for 7 years, and never heard of that!! (Of course, it's a
White Russian without the coke.) I'll have to try it some time. We're having
another banger 4th of July party, sounds like a good time to try it out!!
Thanks for the recipe! Lara..........

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] frozen mudslides Was Pat....
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/31/2003 8:19:13 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I bartended for a while, and a good one to try is (I ve heard it called both of these) and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/31/2003 8:19:13 PM Eastern Standard Time,
sharonashleigh@... writes:


> I don't drink much either -- hardly at all so that's why if I am going
> to drink, I want a tasty one!!
> Sharon :)

I bartended for a while, and a good one to try is (I've heard it called both
of these) and Arizona Bulldog or a Phoenix Bulldog. Make it like this: In a
tall glass put a shot of Vodka, shot of Kahlua. Fill the rest of the glass
with half milk, half coke. Yum, tastes like a coke float.

I agree with you. Rarely drink and I don't even want to taste the alcohol.
Although, an ice cold Amber Bock or Michelob light hits the spot once in a
great while...

Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: frozen mudslides Was Pat....
messages.msgSnippet: I don t drink much either -- hardly at all so that s why if I am going to drink, I want a tasty one!! Sharon  :)
messages.messageBody:
I don't drink much either -- hardly at all so that's why if I am going
to drink, I want a tasty one!!
Sharon :)
